website_summaries.verdict: You'd have a difficult time finding nicer tweezers for a lower price that are also manufactured by a brand that stands out in the cosmetic industry.
pros: Not only are they pretty, but these Revlon tweezers earn top marks for their slanted tips, which are precisely angled to grasp tough hairs
Name brand with a budget price tag
cons: Just a few consumers who have owned Revlon tweezers before say that these are a bit less sturdy than older versions

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tweezers!
customer_reviews.text: I do not mind or care that I received a different color than what was previewed - All that matters is how well they work. And they work wonderfully! If you're looking for high quality tweezers, look no further. The ones I received are pink with a bit of a rose design. Pink is good! No one else will steal them in my house. :)
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Great tweezers!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tweezers--work just as well as the ones I've bought for $25-$30. I had exactly the same pair of tweezers for years, and sadly dropped them on a tile floor, which messed up the way the tweezer heads meet. I bought these tweezers (exact same model) and am very satisfied. Great tweezers, great price, work as well as much more expensive tweezers.
customer_reviews.author: HvnSnt

customer_reviews.title: RIPOFF
customer_reviews.text: RIPOFF! I want the product shown, not the ugly hearts I received. Would not have purchased had I known that the product I received would be different from the item listing. There is absolutely no mention of different styles in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: XOrion9X

customer_reviews.title: My go to tweezers.
customer_reviews.text: It's always hard to find a good pair of tweezers. These have never let me down. I always buy a new one after 3 years mines always become dull. The only thing is I didnt realize I wasnt going to get the color pictured. Which is fine the ones I did receive are cute and work just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gold

customer_reviews.title: Can't Pluck hair
customer_reviews.text: It's weird that these are a name brand, and the same as other tweezers that I have, but they don't close tight enough to pluck an eyebrow hair. It's almost as if it needs to be filed down so the 2 sides mate up with each other.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a VERY old (many years old) pair of Revlon tweezers with a fresh, new pair. These work great! I’m predicting them to last as long as my other pair.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two name brands tweezers and they just didn't work. I thought what the heck, reviews were good for Revlon tweezers. These are the best tweezers I have found and a very reasonable price, bonus. I ordered a second pair today!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Can’t have enough
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I use to buy this one at target but they stopped selling it for some reason so we had to look for it online. My husband loves these tweezers so much he bought three. One for me one for him one extra.
customer_reviews.author: LittleEDev

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Photos
customer_reviews.text: I would have actually given this a decent rating because I’m sure it is a good pair of tweezers but you can’t just use one single stock photo and have that serve as your representation of the product. Giving this a bad review so they’ll actually change the stock photo or describe the pattern options available and allowing people to choose what design they want before just sending them some random item
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Best tweezers I have EVER owned
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tweezers. Pretty pink is an added touch! These tweezers feel firm and comfortable in your hand. I looked for years for the perfect tweezers. This tweezer gets the thinnest, finest shortest hair and effortlessly allows plucking it away! Sturdy metal tweezers. Smooth, even soft plastic, almost fabric feel to the coating on the tweezers. No sharp edges or rough spots. I love this tweezer! 🐇
customer_reviews.author: Princess Bunny~

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong design, but I'll still use them.
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers are high quality but I received a pair that are red with a black design. The ones I ordered are white with pink flowers. That's alright though, not the end of the world. I'll still use them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Begley

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers are a waste of money. They are too difficult to use as you can't squeeze them together to tweeze any hair. I am sticking with my Tweezerman for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: They line up perfectly, so no problem pulling the hair you're after! Seems like the same great quality I've always gotten from Revlon! The area of the tweezers is pretty large, so if you're looking for precision, you may want a narrower tweeze edge.
customer_reviews.author: Katniss05Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These are great tweezers. They make it simple to grasp tiny hairs and my husband easily removed an embedded splinter. I can’t keep tweezers in my house - my kids keep stealing them and losing them 🤦🏼‍♀️ So I’m sure I’ll be re-ordering soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Revlon tweezers
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Lost my fantastic tweezerman so I went with these to try-will be buying another tweezerman ...very hard to grasp hair without pinching skin, color not what I expected. Will not use again
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Good tweezers
customer_reviews.text: These I find work really well to get those stubborn hairs out without damaging your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but terrible
customer_reviews.text: This item was very disappointing. I didn’t get the one I ordered and the tweezers are just terrible quality and did not work at all. All I needed it for was to maintain my eyebrows and it did not pluck on hair. Would not order it again. The packaging came looking as if it was dragged or was just sitting somewhere for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Tatinhabsb02

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love revlon eye tweezers. They are so hard to find in shops where I live. They are durable and tips are sharp enough to be accurate without too sharp against skin.
customer_reviews.author: Laura lu

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I've had some of these tweezers for 8 plus years. They are the only ones I will ever buy. Buying these for an extra pair in the bathroom, and a pair for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Quality ok but same as in a drug store. Don’t see value in fancy red color or psvhage
customer_reviews.author: robert frostTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this particular type at CVS for several years and they keep disappearing. I imagine because they really are precise.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected, but should work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for one I bought in a drugstore (and later lost). This seems like a cheaper knock off than my first one. The case is flimsy, not rigid like before and the tools feel a little less stiff too. Different pattern than pictured as well.
customer_reviews.author: L W

customer_reviews.title: Pretty tweezers
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. I love the design and they work just fine. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra from Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Very sharp and grabs hairs very precisely. One pull does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace the same pair of revlon tweezers that I've had for years.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Tweezer doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my eyebrowse and I cant get it to pull even one hair out....useless...I am throwing it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Tweezers
customer_reviews.text: Have bought these several times. Good for hard to get hairs that are tough.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to tweezers in my wax salon. Tweezerman does not compare.
customer_reviews.author: ComputerBastard

customer_reviews.title: Great for a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Only last for a couple of months, but does work and takes a lot of hair out.
customer_reviews.author: dailys

customer_reviews.title: Best tweezers for your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Best tweezers I have ever used! The price for them on Amazon is unbeatable!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise B

customer_reviews.title: Average tweezers.
customer_reviews.text: They changed their version of these and I liked the old ones better. These are okay.
customer_reviews.author: lynettep

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Worst tweezers I’ve ever used. So sharp they ripped my face apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Grabs hair tight pulls with out breaking off.
customer_reviews.text: Great at grabbing the hair no how small the hair is. And for us ladies with chin whiskers that's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, not tweezerman but great tweezers for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Arland kerkove

customer_reviews.title: $3 pair of tweezers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tweezers to try as an alternative to the more expensive Tweezerman brand. You get what you pay for. These are harder to close and do not grip even thicker hairs. They are more like a $3 pair from a discount store. Save your money and invest in a higher quality brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Rich

customer_reviews.title: Best tweezers ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I made this purchase, I’ve been searching for the right pair of tweezers has bought so many in stores and have been disappointed with those, this was my last resort and I’m so happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find an eyebrow tweezer that was like my old revlon tweezers. I did not like this new one. There was not a lot of tension and they were really thick. They did not perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Heet

customer_reviews.title: OK if you need tweezers
customer_reviews.text: I'm not impressed. My old ones were getting worn on the pickup end. These are no better
customer_reviews.author: J. Kovsky

customer_reviews.title: Cool design but don’t work that great.
customer_reviews.text: I have a super old pair of revlon tweezers. Since I loved them so much I went with the same brand but wanted a fun design. They just don’t work as good as my old pair.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grip!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tweezers I have ever found, and the only ones I will buy. This is my 3rd pair!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great tweezers
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered about 4 tweezers lately and these are the only ones that truly grip. Pretty as well as functional. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Wrong design.
customer_reviews.text: Got ugly pink flower design, not the design pictured. This was supposed to be a gift for a guy. Don't buy, unless you don't care what it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Revlon tweezer
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST TWEEZER...AND I HAVE TRYED MUCH MORE EXPENSIVE ONES!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M.

customer_reviews.title: went out of my way to get this set,
customer_reviews.text: went out of my way to get this set, found it years ago in a little drugstore - it is the only tweezer that works consistently for me
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bogut

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have really liked these tweezers and like that they come in a case to keep in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Seller advertises a different color then what you will get
customer_reviews.text: Ordered what is pictured. Got the same item but not the color in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Barely grabbed any hairs. The hairs must be very thick for it to grab. Waste.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Duong

customer_reviews.title: Great tweezers
customer_reviews.text: great tweezer. I hate tweezing but this makes it easy and fast to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would never change brand!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sharpness of the tweezers for difficult eyebrow hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect for plucking stubborn eyebrow hairs. They last too!!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Best tweezers I have ever had. Got free shipping also.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Babe

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Best tweezers for the money! They close and grip very well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: but perfect for my purse
customer_reviews.text: Just wish they were bigger, but perfect for my purse..they work great
customer_reviews.author: Violetta Leilia M.L.E.

customer_reviews.title: Different than pictured
customer_reviews.text: I have given these tweezers a 3 star due to the fact they were supposed to be red & they are grayish white & white flowers. Other wise Revlon is my fav product's
customer_reviews.author: Ann Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Ordered
customer_reviews.text: I did not get what I ordered. The pictures lie!! Haha, it's a trap! I didn't return them though, I felt it was too much work to do.
customer_reviews.author: Anabel Strobeck

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate pic
customer_reviews.text: Received a different design than the one i wanted wanted the one with roses in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Ambeezy

customer_reviews.title: Very good hold and a clean sharp slant tip.
customer_reviews.text: Best tweezer I currently have for function. It gets a good grip every time. I bought about 8 different tweezers recently and returned all but this one. Prices ranged from $4 to $22. This one is one of the lowest priced and was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn D Flaming

customer_reviews.title: Love Revlon tweezers
customer_reviews.text: I really love Revlon tweezer . these arw pretty thick , at times hard to grasp the hair on my chin . and as many mentioned in their review I did not recive the particular one i ordered . but it really didn't matree to me the pattern or color on the tweezers, These are sharp so id say be very careful with your skin. Overall no complaints does the job
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slanted tweezers
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite tweezers. When I lost my last pair I thought I would be slick and buy some other set. Nope. Total garbage. DOn't waste your time or money on anything else. These work and they are amazing every time you pick them up.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra M Trendel

customer_reviews.title: Pink rose color, not as seen
customer_reviews.text: Pink rose petals: is the color. Sadly it's not as seen, however the product itself is perfect and reasonably priced. And it does say it is random since we ordered 2 i thought it would be 2 different ones. Oh well, doesn't matter, they work fabulous!!
customer_reviews.author: Safety

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Slant Tip Tweezers
customer_reviews.text: These come individually packaged (excellent feature). Particularly like & have used this brand (Revlon) . Definitely recommend & will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product delivered in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.text: Package was received in brand new condition. I love these tweezers. They are incredibly precise. The only reason I'm giving this 4 stars is because the item received was a different color and pattern than pictured. I wanted the specific color and pattern shown for personal reasons. Getting a different color was a bit of a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Sebaskin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tweezers
customer_reviews.text: Well built and makes it easy to reach all the hard to reach hairs because of the slanted tip! Super sturdy and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Reed

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best tweezers ever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through a lot of crappy tweezers. These rule. They do exactly what they are supposed w—Grip and Pluck. Perfection
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tweezer for any hair type
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to tweezers. Whether it’s a thick black head or fine blond hair, these do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: LaNae Marks

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been looking for years and now has the right tweezers to do the job. She is one picky lady and this has satisfied her completely. Buy them and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Haybay

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've used this type of tweezer from Revlon for years, and they never cease to perform.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lobert

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but colors vary.
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that I (me yes me) didn’t realize that the colors vary. I really wanted the cherry blossom ones. Cherry blossoms are my altimeter favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Metivier

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I love these tweezers and they are half the price than what stores sell them for!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: The tweezers are pretty and they do what I need them to do.
customer_reviews.author: Baa Baa Black Sheep

customer_reviews.title: Great tweezers😉
customer_reviews.text: My sister had a pair of these..... I had to buy a pair for myself😉
customer_reviews.author: kathy bendele

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For some reason these are the best. I like them better than the really expensive brand!
customer_reviews.author: Paige's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slant tip!
customer_reviews.text: Love the slant tip. Does a good job on eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: BLove

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Revlon
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and loose. Difficult to use on brows. Disappointed in this Revlon product.
customer_reviews.author: hckyfan91

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tweezers, get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I like the tweezers very much. Grab fine hair and hold on to remove .
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQue

customer_reviews.title: Very precise!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, precise tip, makes hair or splinter removal a piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best for eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: They are the only tweezers I like for plucking my eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Denille E. Obermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great as always.
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this style of tweezer for years. Nice prints.
customer_reviews.author: Flower Freek

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They don't grab the hair like my older Revlon tweezers. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dnabare

customer_reviews.title: Great Tweezers
customer_reviews.text: These are great tweezers, like better than the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: nanny dodo

customer_reviews.title: Totally different tweezers arrived then ordered
customer_reviews.text: Totally different tweezers arrived, not as pictured at all. So don’t order them thinking they’ll look like the image.
customer_reviews.author: hi D

customer_reviews.title: Dullest Tip Ever....Brand New
customer_reviews.text: This product has incredibly dull tips, brand new. I struggled to get an eyebrow let alone a finer hair. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn DeP

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.: (
customer_reviews.text: Not as sharp and thin as the Revlon tweezers I had before. Disappointed. :(
customer_reviews.author: avermilliano

customer_reviews.title: Not as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: The design pictured in the add was nothing like what arrived.
customer_reviews.author: gcc3

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best tweezers I've gotten so far. They grip really well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: They work very well for an inexpensive pair of tweezers. Could have more gripping power.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good tweezers, love the color i got, get sharp very precise.
customer_reviews.author: CatherineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good. I have an older tweezer that is much much better.
customer_reviews.author: R. THORNE

customer_reviews.title: So far tweezers grip well so I like using them
customer_reviews.text: So far tweezers grip well so I like using them. I hope the two sides continue to match up smoothly and make tweezing easier and less painful.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers work really well and I love the design! They are just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: and unlike many tweezers it has a good grip!
customer_reviews.text: It works well, and unlike many tweezers it has a good grip!
customer_reviews.author: L. Fleming-Mitchell

product_meta.title: Revlon Designer Collection Slant Tip Tweezer, Stainless Steel (colors may vary)
product_meta.description:
Style Name:TweezersOur perfectly aligned, ultra-precise slant tips allow for high precision tweezing, grabbing hairs with ease. Perfectly aligned tips and perfect handle tension allows for superior control. No makeup bag is complete without it.

BRAND STORY
By Revlon
feature_bullets: Perfectly aligned slant tips for high precision tweezing.
Style may vary in the Slanted Tweezer

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
